entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 a.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
